info.title: Bistro Bliss API
info.description: This is the API documentation for the Bistro Bliss restaurant project

post.description: Destroys the authenticated session and logs the user out by deleting their authentication token.
Sends a new email verification link to the authenticated user. If the user has already verified their email, they are redirected to the home page.

requestBody.description: No body is required, authenticated user is automatically detected

application/json.example: Too many requests. Please try again later.

status.example: Password reset link sent to your email address.

message.example: The email must be a valid email address.
Registration successful. Please verify your email to activate your account.
The username has already been taken.

get.summary: Verify user's email using ID and hash
get.description: This endpoint verifies the user's email using a signed URL. It requires the user ID and verification hash in the URL.

application/json.example: Too many requests. Please try again later.

patch.description: Updates the status of a booking and sends an email notification to the user with the payment link if accepted.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the booking to update

200.description: Booking status updated and email sent

message.example: Booking status updated and email sent

get.summary: Get bookings of the authenticated user

message.example: This booking request has been deleted successfully

patch.summary: User can update his booking details

get.description: Fetches a list of all contact messages, ordered by the most recent first.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the contact message to delete

get.summary: Get a list of menu items
get.description: Fetches a paginated list of all menu items. Accessible by anyone.

post.description: Creates a new menu item. Accessible only by admins.

get.description: Fetches details of a specific menu item by ID. Accessible by anyone.

put.description: Updates an existing menu item by ID. Accessible only by admins.

delete.description: Deletes a specific menu item by ID. Accessible only by admins.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the user to update

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the user to delete

message.example: I am interested in learning more about your services.

user_id.description: User ID associated with the booking

total_person.description: Total number of people for the booking
